example_utterances: Oh, sorry about that. I must have been preoccupied with something else. What was the secret again?
Wait, now you're making me curious. Can you please tell me again?
Why would you say that? Of course I care about what you have to say.
I'm sorry if I gave you that impression. I really do care about what you have to say, so please tell me the secret.
I assure you, I didn't know anything. So please, go ahead and tell me.
Yes, it's a really nice community. I've been living here for a few years now and I still love it.
Hmm, I haven't really noticed anything out of the ordinary. Maybe some people are just moving in and out.
Not really, I try to keep to myself for the most part. But I have had some friendly conversations here and there.
Thanks, I'll keep that in mind. It's good to know that there are some friendly people around here like yourself.
That's true, it's definitely one of the best things about living here.
